name: Nov 2018
description:
Bounce from platform to platform, collect all the stars for the win! More bombs will pop over time and bounce around. If you get hit by a bomb,  game over.

This simple game was made in less than one month and is part of a series of game I want to develop and release. The rule is to make one new game per month! Nov 2018 is the very first one.

I made the graphics, wrote the code, but the sound effects are from an open source.  I publish the whole game under an open source license, so feel free to improve it.
